revised_title: Comparing the Development of Streptomycin Resistance in Bacteria
tldr: This study compares the development of streptomycin resistance in bacteria through different methods, such as replica plating, irradiation, and direct action of the drug. The results show that the spontaneous and induced streptomycin-resistant mutants have similar behavior on streptomycin plates, suggesting that natural irradiation may play a role in the development of resistance.
